title: Different people, different wild: Comparing and mapping wilderness representation in Wuyishan National Park, China

Source: Geography and Sustainability, Volume 5, Issue 1

Author(s): Aifang Weng, Lingyun Liao, Yue Cao, Steve Carver, Li Lin, Siyuan Shen, Zhengduo Xu, Jianwen Dong, Siren Lan, Rui Yang
